Date: **December 2024**


------------------------------------------------------------------------

This website documents the efforts to do the exercises of Richard McElreath's "Rethinking statistics", ed.2. We build on the following efforts: 

We read: (Rethinking Statistics, second edition)[https://xcelab.net/rm/]

lectures are at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cclUd_HoRlo&list=PLDcUM9US4XdMROZ57-OIRtIK0aOynbgZN&index=2

we use this for the code: https://bookdown.org/content/c23e1ece-b5d6-4cab-8d8e-978c2e5b7a53/sampling-the-imaginary.html#sampling-to-summarize

solutions to practice are at: https://sr2-solutions.wjakethompson.com/bayesian-inference#chapter-2
